# Transparenta.eu â€” AI Usage Guide

Base URL:
- https://transparenta.eu

## Routes Overview
- /entities/{cui}: Single entity details and analytics
- /entity-analytics: Cross-entity analytics (table, treemap, line-items)
- /budget-explorer: Budget exploration by categories (functional/economic)

## Entities Page (/entities/{cui})
How to query:
1) Put the entity CUI in the path: /entities/4267117
2) Add filters as query params. Common examples:
   - ?year=2025
   - ?period=YEAR | QUARTER | MONTH
   - ?view=overview | map | income-trends | expense-trends
   - ?normalization=total | total_euro | per_capita | per_capita_euro

Parameters (full docs):
- https://transparenta.eu/ai/entities-parameters.json

Examples:
- https://transparenta.eu/entities/4267117?view=overview&year=2024
- https://transparenta.eu/entities/4267117?year=2025&view=map&normalization=per_capita
- https://transparenta.eu/entities/4267117?period=QUARTER&quarter=Q4

## Entity Analytics (/entity-analytics)
Purpose: Compare entities with filters and switch views (table/line-items/treemap)
Common params:
- filter.report_period.type=YEAR|QUARTER|MONTH
- filter.account_category=ch|vn
- filter.normalization=total|per_capita|total_euro|per_capita_euro
- view=table|line-items
- treemapPrimary=fn|ec, treemapDepth=main|detail

Parameters JSON: (coming from schema)
- https://transparenta.eu/ai/entities-analytics-parameters.json

Example:
- https://transparenta.eu/entity-analytics?view=line-items

## Budget Explorer (/budget-explorer)
Purpose: Explore budget composition across categories and years
Common params:
- view=overview|treemap|sankey|list
- primary=fn|ec, depth=main|detail
- filter.{report_period, account_category, normalization, report_type}

Parameters JSON:
- https://transparenta.eu/ai/budget-explorer-parameters.json

Examples:
- https://transparenta.eu/budget-explorer?view=treemap&primary=fn
- https://transparenta.eu/budget-explorer?view=list&filter.account_category=vn

Notes:
- Year range supported: dynamic; see parameter JSON files for min/max.
- All parameters are optional unless stated; defaults are inferred from the UI.
